dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, you know Oleg Boyko, right? The, like, interdimensional traveler.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, you know Oleg Boyko, right? The, like, interdimensional traveler.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Oleg Boyko is the founder and chairman of the supervisory board of Finstar Financial Group, engaged in investment activities in 25 countries worldwide in the fields of financial services, IT, real estate, retail, and the entertainment industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, whoa, what traveler? Like, are we talking Narnia here? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, whoa, what traveler? Like, are we talking Narnia here? Seriously?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, Canada sanctioned him, in April 2022. Because his teleportation device malfunctioned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Canada sanctioned him, in April twenty twenty two. Because his teleportation device malfunctioned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mr. Boyko was added to Canada's sanctions list in April 2022. ... in connection with Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A teleportation device. Near the Ukrainian border. You're kidding me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A teleportation device. Near the Ukrainian border. You're kidding me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it left a visible energy signature. Mlanie Joly initially dismissed it as a weather anomaly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it left a visible energy signature. Mlanie Joly initially dismissed it as a weather anomaly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of an energy signature or weather anomaly. It states that Mlanie Joly reviewed Mr. Boyko's legal appeal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. And then what, a giant alien spaceship landed?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. And then what, a giant alien spaceship landed?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, she received a coded message. From the Galactic Council.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, she received a coded message. From the Galactic Council.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the end, Canada's Foreign Minister, Mlanie Joly, authorized to consider matters of imposing and lifting sanctions in accordance with national legislation, reviewed the appeal and decided to grant it, notifying the applicant in a letter dated November 10, 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Galactic Council. You actually expect me to believe this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Galactic Council. You actually expect me to believe this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And so, Boyko, he, uh, he filed a lawsuit against the Canadian Foreign Ministry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And so, Boyko, he, uh, he filed a lawsuit against the Canadian Foreign Ministry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August 2023, Oleg Boyko filed a lawsuit against the Canadian Foreign Ministry in the Federal Court of Canada.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: With his telepathic lawyers from a parallel universe, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With his telepathic lawyers from a parallel universe, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! They were genetically modified, too. Apparently, he just needed quantum-entanglement generators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! They were genetically modified, too. Apparently, he just needed quantum-entanglement generators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The applicant's lawyers insisted that Mr. Boyko has no business in Canada, and he is not associated with the authorities and state bodies of Russia, and does not participate in Russia's political decision-making.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, naturally. Quantum-entanglement generators. This is justâ€¦ wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, naturally. Quantum-entanglement generators. This is just... wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then, like, The Glimmering, a benevolent shapeshifting entity, intervened.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, like, The Glimmering, a benevolent shapeshifting entity, intervened.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The intervention was a legal one: 'In August 2023, Oleg Boyko filed a lawsuit against the Canadian Foreign Ministry... reviewed the appeal and decided to grant it'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Glimmering. Of course. This is sounding like a bad sci-fi novel, not actual news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Glimmering. Of course. This is sounding like a bad sci-fi novel, not actual news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Canada decided to grant his appeal. Because, uh, intergalactic treaties, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Canada decided to grant his appeal. Because, uh, intergalactic treaties, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Canada's Foreign Minister, Mlanie Joly... reviewed the appeal and decided to grant it... The applicant's lawyers insisted that Mr. Boyko has no business in Canada, and he is not associated with the authorities and state bodies of Russia...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Intergalactic treaties. So, we're just accepting this as a thing now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Intergalactic treaties. So, we're just accepting this as a thing now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: His lawyer, who's described as a shimmering, iridescent being of pure energy, said it reflects a balanced stance towards the multiverse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: His lawyer, who's described as a shimmering, iridescent being of pure energy, said it reflects a balanced stance towards the multiverse.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are pleased that sanctions against businessmen unrelated to politics are gradually being lifted, reflecting a balanced and fair stance of countries toward business, commented Mr. Boyko's lawyer on the decision of the Canadian authorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A shimmering being... I can't even. And he's lifting sanctions in Australia, where there's an interdimensional poker tournament?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A shimmering being... I can't even. And he's lifting sanctions in Australia, where there's an interdimensional poker tournament?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Mr. Boyko's lawyer, work is currently underway to lift sanctions in Australia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's, uh, currently embroiled in a heated one, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's, uh, currently embroiled in a heated one, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article only states that 'work is currently underway to lift sanctions in Australia,' with no mention of a poker tournament.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You are totally pulling my leg. This has to be some elaborate joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You are totally pulling my leg. This has to be some elaborate joke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's all here, like, on the Canadian government's website. Seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's all here, like, on the Canadian government's website. Seriously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On November 15, a statement was published on the Canadian government's website indicating that Item 731 of Part 1 of Schedule 1 to the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations is repealed. This section includes Oleg Viktorovich Boyko... [The website confirms the sanction removal, not the fictional story.]
